title: Living Ready 04 - Fall 2013
description:
thePiratePimp note :



English | PDF | 100 pages | 31.8 MB


Living Ready survival magazines continue to sell out on newsstands across the continent. While staff does keep a few emergency magazines on hand, those back issues aren't always available in print. That's why Living Ready compiled its catalog of survival magazines here.

Like everything within the Living Ready universe, the foremost prepper magazine is divided into three parts: Prepared, Skilled and Aware.

Prepared sections focus on what to do before something happens. This means getting ready with survival kits, gear, supplies and information.

The Skilled areas concentrate on the application of those Prepared parts. These tutorials and how-to articles are some of the most popular in the entire survival magazine.

Aware portions provide hindsight on events that have happened. These articles draw lessons from experiences to make readers better Prepared and Skilled.

Add it all up, and Living Ready is without a doubt the leading survival magazine on newsstands today. Check an issue out for yourself and see why.


Living Ready magazine takes an adult view of the Boy Scout motto of Ã¢â‚¬Å“Be Prepared.Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ The magazine's focus is summed up in the three-word subtitle: Prepared, Skilled, Aware. All survival scenariosÃ¢â‚¬â€urban, wilderness, disaster or day-to-day lifeÃ¢â‚¬â€will be covered. The magazine will also debunk bad survival advice, give better advice in return and provide a common sense approach to live ready and prepared.

This PDF version of the Fall 2013 issue features the fall harvest. It contains these informative articles:

Featured Articles
~Special Venison Section: How to prepare America's healthiest red meat
~Orchard Keeper: Grow delicious fruit and attract wildlife
~Snag Some Lunch: How to make survival snares
~Thanksgiving Bird: Add wild turkeys to the fall menu
~Hunt Ginseng: Learn how to find this valuable root
~Late-Garden: Plant these cool-weather crops this autumn

Prepared
~The Adaptable Shotgun: Mossberg's Model 500 Flex
~Best Survival Knives of 2013: Our writer checks out the world's biggest knife show
~Razors Redux: The old boxcutter gets a radical redesign
~Woodstove Simplicity: Claim your energy independence by firewood
~Protect and Serve: dogs + humans = ultimate survival partnership
~The .22 Caliber Equation: Less means more with the .22LR

Skilled
~One Grid to Rule Them All: How to U.S. National Grid works and how it can save your neck
~Surviving Gotham: Make an urban preparedness plan
~Ask the Survival Doctor: Disease-ridden ticks, snakebites and superglue for cuts
~21 Days: Survival lessons from the Discovery Channel's Naked and Afraid
~Reading the Earth: A missing child, a wounded animal - how to track anything

Aware
~The Outlaw Hermit: Alone in the woods and undetected for 27 years
~The Blizzard from Nowhere: Will the deadly Armistice Day Storm of 1940 happen again?
~Wise Words Heeded: Quotes to keep you mentally sharp
